TopicTitle: KSP EP01 Career 1.05 A New Begining

Articles.Content:
Hello

I have started a new lets play of KSP 1.05.

Feel free to comment on the lets play style and the Kerbaling!

Thanks for watching!

With the new aero since I last played re-entry is much more difficult!


[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bn6lRcpSo1w]Jeb we have a problem[/url]


[video=youtube;bn6lRcpSo1w]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bn6lRcpSo1w[/video]

[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rLNGQzObcTI]Episode 1 Here[/url]


[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Paz3x3dizmY]Vals Turn[/url]

Time for Val to show Jeb how its done


[video=youtube;Paz3x3dizmY]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Paz3x3dizmY[/video]

[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Paz3x3dizmY[/url]

Are you planning on adding any story to this, or is it just going to be you playing?

If you didn't figure it out, there is an issue with the heat shield that will kill you. Either don't use it (you dont need it where you are in career), or decouple it after you get through the burning effects.

[quote name='Aser']Are you planning on adding any story to this, or is it just going to be you playing?

If you didn't figure it out, there is an issue with the heat shield that will kill you. Either don't use it (you dont need it where you are in career), or decouple it after you get through the burning effects.[/QUOTE]

Hi Aser, Thanks for the reply.

Yep, that heat shield sure does add enough weight to cause problems slowing down. I guess it is required when coming back from the Mun or further?

I think my play through is story enough for me, but I am always looking for ways to improve my videos.

Thanks for watching
